mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_portfolios (user_id, etf_symbol, quantity, average_price, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{etfSymbol}, #{quantity}, #{averagePrice}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, etf_symbol, quantity, average_price, created_at, updated_at FROM user_portfolios WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY etf_symbol
